cgcloud__Business_Year__c.name: cgcloud__Business_Year__c
cgcloud__Business_Year__c.description: This object stores the attributes of the Business Year.

cgcloud__Date_From__c.description: Start date of the Business Year.

cgcloud__Date_Thru__c.description: End date of the Business Year.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Label__c.description: Describes the Business Year for which the plan is created.

cgcloud__Sales_Organization__c.description: Describes the Sales Organization to which the Business Year belongs.

cgcloud__Year_Number__c.description: Year Number that's used for the Business Year.
